sn55.9:4.1: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn55.9:4.4: Asokā nāma, bhante, bhikkhunī kālaṅkatā … pe …
sn55.9:4.5: asoko nāma, bhante, upāsako kālaṅkato … pe …
sn55.9:5.1: “Asoko, ānanda, bhikkhu kālaṅkato āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi … pe …
sn55.9:6.1: Ayaṃ kho so, ānanda, dhammādāso dhammapariyāyo;
sn55.9:6.2: yena samannāgato ariyasāvako ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya:
sn55.9:6.3: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto, sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’”ti.
